note.p: Birth: The barton of Kilgilliack, Budock, near Falmouth, Cornwall, England (18 December 1815)
Education: St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1839) MB (1843, Oxford), MD (1859, Oxford)
Career: Physician, Cornwall General Infirmary; Honorary Secretary, Royal Institution of Cornwall; was paralysed for several years before his death
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1893 vol 54 pp i-iii signed by E D
